name: FNF Corruption: Soul BF Full Week DEMO
name_original: FNF Corruption: Soul BF Full Week DEMO
description:
This is a playable Soul BF Week from the Corruption mod by Phantom Fear!

This mod is a DEMO, and only features 5 songs.

  • Tormentor
  • Sunshine
  • Faker
  • Not so Triple Trouble
  • You can't run

Bug Fixes:

- Fixed Faker being too low in volume.

Make sure to play on Hard difficulty (Canon mode) for the best results!
